metadata.Title: CVE-2023-0697 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Inappropriate implementation in Full screen mode in Google Chrome on Android prior to 110.0.5481.77 allowed a remote attacker to spoof the contents of the security UI via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: High)

notes.Note: alexmurray> The Debian chromium source package is called chromium-browser in Ubuntu mdeslaur> starting with Ubuntu 19.10, the chromium-browser package is just a script that installs the Chromium snap sbeattie> likely only affects chrome on Android

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
